text: I've been using Windows as my primary machine for the last year (after about a decade of cycling through Solaris/Linux/MacOs as my primary development environment) and I must say I don't regret it. Every OS has compromises, and I don't feel too handicapped on Windows. The trigger that got me to move was Windows Terminal primarily, and WSL to a lesser extent.
